scripts.build-helloworld: tspeg grammer/helloworld.peg grammer/helloworld.ts && tsc -t ES2015 -m commonjs grammer/helloworld.ts && tsc -t ES2015 -m commonjs examples/helloworld.ts
scripts.run-helloworld: npm run build-helloworld && node examples/helloworld.js Hello World
scripts.build-math: tspeg grammer/math.peg grammer/math.ts && tsc -t ES2015 -m commonjs grammer/math.ts && tsc -t ES2015 -m commonjs examples/math.ts
